latestVersion.termsOfUse: This dataset uses data from a number of third-party source datasets either in raw format, or as processed by us according to the methods described in the accompanying documentation. As such, users of our dataset should consult the documentation of the source datasets for pertinent usage restrictions and cite, where applicable, the original sources along with their citation for our dataset. Beyond any restrictions that might be inherited from the source datasets, we are not imposing restrictions for reuse, but would appreciate a note if our data is used.

fields.value: Climate Equity Reference Calculator Database, version 7.2.0 (Sep 2018)

dsDescriptionValue.value: This is version 7.2.0 of the core database for the Climate Equity Reference Calculator (calculator.climateequityreference.org).

publicationCitation.value: Holz, Christian, Sivan Kartha, and Tom Athanasiou (2018) "Fairly Sharing 1.5 – National Fair Shares of a 1.5°C‑compliant Global Mitigation Effort." International Environmental Agreements: Politics, Law and Economics, 18 (Special Issue: Achieving 1.5°C and Climate Justice), pp. 117-134
CSO Review (2018) After Paris: Inequality, Fair Shares, and the Climate Emergency. Manilla, London, Cape Town, Washington, et al.: CSO Equity Review Coalition.
CSO Review (2017) Equity and the Ambition Ratchet: Towards a Meaningful 2018 Facilitative Dialogue. Manilla, London, Cape Town, Washington, et al.: CSO Equity Review Coalition.
CSO Review (2016) Setting the Path Towards 1.5°C: A Civil Society Equity Review of Pre-2020 Ambition. Manilla, London, Cape Town, Washington, et al.: CSO Equity Review Coalition.
CSO Review (2015) Fair Shares: A Civil Society Equity Review of INDCs. Manilla, London, Cape Town, Washington, et al.: CSO Equity Review Coalition.

value: The data sources for this composite dataset and our methods of processing them are referenced and explained in the accompanying documentation.

files.description: The 'core' table of the calculator database. This table contains, for all countries, data from 1850 to 2050 (where applicable) for historical emissions, baseline projections, GDP (historical and projected), population (historical and projected) etc.
files.label: CERP_Core_DB_v7_2_0-core.tab

dataFile.description: The 'core' table of the calculator database. This table contains, for all countries, data from 1850 to 2050 (where applicable) for historical emissions, baseline projections, GDP (historical and projected), population (historical and projected) etc.

files.description: The 'country' table of the calculator database. This table maps the ISO3 codes used in the database to country names.
files.label: CERP_Core_DB_v7_2_0-country.tab

dataFile.description: The 'country' table of the calculator database. This table maps the ISO3 codes used in the database to country names.

files.description: This document describes the main data sources and approaches for the data contained in the Climate Equity Reference Calculator Database.
files.label: CERP_Core_DB_v7_2_0-Documentation.pdf

dataFile.description: This document describes the main data sources and approaches for the data contained in the Climate Equity Reference Calculator Database.

files.description: The 'pathway_names' table of the calculator database. This table maps the short names of the mitigation pathways used in the database to mitigation pathway names and notes.
files.label: CERP_Core_DB_v7_2_0-pathway_names.tab

dataFile.description: The 'pathway_names' table of the calculator database. This table maps the short names of the mitigation pathways used in the database to mitigation pathway names and notes.

files.description: The 'pathways' table of the calculator database. This table contains the emissions data (disaggregated into fossil CO2, LULUCF CO2, and non-CO2) for the three mitigation pathways used in this database version.
files.label: CERP_Core_DB_v7_2_0-pathways.tab

dataFile.description: The 'pathways' table of the calculator database. This table contains the emissions data (disaggregated into fossil CO2, LULUCF CO2, and non-CO2) for the three mitigation pathways used in this database version.

files.description: The complete Climate Equity Reference Calculator Database, in sqlite3 format. This file can be used to run the Climate Equity Reference Calculator with this database version, regardless of the version currently used by the calculator. Run the calculator with the upload_db=1 flag to use this function, i.e. https://calculator.climateequityreference.org/?upload_db=1
files.label: CERP_Core_DB_v7_2_0.sqlite3

dataFile.description: The complete Climate Equity Reference Calculator Database, in sqlite3 format. This file can be used to run the Climate Equity Reference Calculator with this database version, regardless of the version currently used by the calculator. Run the calculator with the upload_db=1 flag to use this function, i.e. https://calculator.climateequityreference.org/?upload_db=1

files.description: The complete Climate Equity Reference Calculator Database, in Excel format. This file is provided as a user-friendly alternative to the SQLite database, containing exactly the same data.
files.label: CERP_Core_DB_v7_2_0.tab

dataFile.description: The complete Climate Equity Reference Calculator Database, in Excel format. This file is provided as a user-friendly alternative to the SQLite database, containing exactly the same data.
